SELECT n.`notictop`,n.`noticcontent`,n.`createtime`,n.`noticid`, u.`name` publishUser,n.`corid`,u1.`name` receiveUser FROM `notic` n LEFT JOIN `sys_user` u ON n.`notictuserid` = u.`user_id` LEFT JOIN `sys_user` u1 ON n.`noticteduserid` = u1.`user_id`
AND u.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{pd.publishUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND n.`corid` = #{pd.corId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND u1.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{pd.receiveUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND n.`createtime` between date_format(#{pd.startTime},'%Y%m%d') AND date_format(#{pd.endTime},'%Y%m%d')

select `notictop`,`noticcontent`,`createTime`,`notictuserid`,`corid`, (SELECT `name` FROM sys_user WHERE sys_user.user_id = notictuserid) `name` FROM `notic` WHERE `noticid`=#{noticId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT id,noticid,noticteduserid, (SELECT `name` FROM sys_user WHERE sys_user.user_id = noticteduserid) `name` FROM noticeduser WHERE id=#{id}
